thread.title: Gramercy Property Trust Declares First Quarter 2018 Dividends

author: cnbc.com
title: Gramercy Property Trust Declares First Quarter 2018 Dividends
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Gramercy Property Trust (NYSE:GPT) , a real estate investment trust, announced today that its Board of Trustees declared a first quarter 2018 dividend on the Company’s common shares in the amount of $0.375 per share, payable on April 16, 2018 to common shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 30, 2018.
The Company’s Board also declared a first quarter 2018 dividend on the Company's 7.125% Series A Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Shares in the amount of $0.44531 per share, payable on April 2, 2018 to preferred shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 19, 2018.
Company Profile
Gramercy Property Trust is a leading global investor and asset manager of commercial real estate. The Company specializes in acquiring and managing high quality, income producing commercial real estate leased to high quality tenants in major markets and Europe.
To review the Company’s latest news releases and other corporate documents, please visit the Company's website at www.gptreit.com or contact Investor Relations at 888-686-0112.
